scripts.install-all: npm install --legacy-peer-deps --prefix client && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --prefix server
scripts.heroku-postbuild: npm install --legacy-peer-deps --prefix client && npm run build-client && mv client/build server/public && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --prefix server && npm install --legacy-peer-deps --prefix bot
scripts.start: npm run migrate --prefix server && npm run start --prefix server
